name: 3dNetCorr
author: AFNI Team
description: Compute correlation matrix of a set of ROIs based on mean time series

inputs.description: Output file name prefix
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Time series file (4D data set)
inputs.name: Input time series file

inputs.description: Input a set of ROIs each labelled with distinct integers. Multiple subbricks can be input, each will be treated as a separate network.
inputs.name: Input ROIs file

inputs.description: Whole brain mask within which to calculate correlation.
inputs.name: Mask

inputs.description: Output Fisher Z-transform matrix along with correlation matrix.
inputs.name: Fisher Z-transform flag

inputs.description: Output the partial correlation matrix.
inputs.name: Partial correlation flag

inputs.description: Output the mean time series of the ROIs.
inputs.name: Time series output flag

inputs.description: Insert the integer ROI label at the start of each line of the *.netts file created.
inputs.name: Time series label flag

inputs.description: Create a directory for each network that contains the average time series for each ROI in individual files.
inputs.name: Individual time series flag

inputs.description: Perform whole brain correlation for each ROI's average time series and output as Pearson 'r' values.
inputs.name: Whole brain correlation flag

inputs.description: Perform whole brain correlation for each ROI's average time series and output as Fisher transformed Z-scores.
inputs.name: Whole brain Fisher Z-score flag

inputs.description: Input a 1D file of weights to be applied multiplicatively to each ROI's average time series.
inputs.name: Weight time series

inputs.description: Input a 1D file of weights to estimate a weighted Pearson Correlation.
inputs.name: Weight correlation

inputs.description: Apply string labels to the WB correlation/Z-score output files.
inputs.name: Whole brain string label flag

inputs.description: Output any correlation map files as NIFTI files.
inputs.name: NIFTI output flag

inputs.description: Output mask of non-null time series.
inputs.name: Output non-null mask flag

inputs.description: Push through the calculation even if any ROI contains more than 10 percent of voxels with null time series.
inputs.name: Push through many zeros flag

inputs.description: Allow ROIs to have all-zero time series.
inputs.name: Allow zero-filled ROI flag

inputs.description: Disable internal automasking of where time series are not uniformly zero.
inputs.name: Automask off flag

inputs.description: Ignore any label table labels in the '-in_rois' file.
inputs.name: Ignore label table flag

output-files.description: Output correlation matrix file for network 000
output-files.name: Output netcc file

output-files.description: Output mean time series per ROI for network 000
output-files.name: Output netts file

output-files.description: NIML/SUMA-esque file for visualizing connectivity info in a 3D brain for network 000
output-files.name: Output NIML file

output-files.description: Columns contain information for each ROI in the used mask.
output-files.name: Output roidat file

output-files.description: Directory containing individual time series files for network 000
output-files.name: Output individual time series directory

output-files.description: Binary mask of the non-null time series
output-files.name: Output binary mask file
